title: A Kindness Repaid
description: Previous cover edition for ASIN B074RMD6Z1For alternate cover edition see hereI wasn't expecting anything special to happen to me besides the norm: finish college, get a job, fall in love, decide to get married to the right man, and have a baby.But life is what happens when you're making plans.One trip to a party in the woods changes my life and sends me back in time to 1849 where everything is raw and simple, but so very complicated, especially when I meed Daniel.What choice do I have but to adapt?It also helps that I find Daniel compelling and he likes me, too.But in this world things are different and our relationship has to move fast because winter is coming to the mountains and I have no place to belong.This is my story of fear, courage, love, and finding my place in the world.
author: Claire  Locke
